name: arstechnica
text:
In the early '90s, Super Mario All-Stars was among the first titles to suggest important old console games—like the early 2D Super Mario Bros. series—shouldn't be stranded on the obsolete hardware that originally hosted them.

Very thankful for precedent. https://t.co/plK172xvki
